name: 12! Demo
description:
12 Factorial is a roguelike looter shooter deckbuilder where you explore your map to kill enemies for loot on your way to kill the boss. Explore buildings, encounter different things, fight enemies and modify your weapons to build you specific deck.

Gameplay:

- Roaming : In this phase you move with the keyboard and don't use energy

- Fighting : Play cards with the option to reshuffle

- Killing an enemy drops an item, which can be modified and equipped

Features:

- Explore procedurally generated maps in multiple biomes and find groups of enemies, items and NPCs.

 - Unique deck mechanic in which only the items you have equipped count towards your deck, and each item has its own cards that can be modified.

 - Turn Based Tactics style fights, where the environment also can help you in the fight.

 - 8 elemental effects and 26 synergies between them. Experiment with them!
